page1.title: What is Artikel Welt?
page1.body: Artikel Welt app is a practical tool that will help you memorize the articles (der, die, das) of the most commonly used German nouns by making a visual connection between the noun and the avatar that represents the article.

page2.title: Masculine (Der)
page2.body: The Super Hero represents all the masculine nouns and he is here to help you remember Masculine nouns

page3.title: Feminine (Die)
page3.body: The Princess represents all the feminine nouns and she will be there for you to help memorize Feminine nouns

page4.title: Neutral (Das)
page4.body: The Robot represents all the neutral nouns and it is programmed to help you to recall Neutral words

page5.title: Proof of concept
page5.body: Please note that this is a proof of concept that contains 95 words only. If you like it please leave a comment in the app store. We are working on a full version with 1000+ words.
